B: Issued at 2.30 p.m. 24 October 2023, valid until 2.30 p.m. 25 October 2023

WW/O/23/10/24/01 ulletin No: 05: For Multi-day boats in the west-central Bay of Bengal Sea areas.

B: The Severe Cyclonic Storm “Hamoon” over the west-central Bay of Bengal has intensified into a Very
Severe Cyclonic Storm during next few hours, it is likely to move nearly east-northeastwards towards
Bangladesh coast away from Sri Lanka.
